reviewtext: Wow!  I LOVE these headphones.  Had I known I would like them so well I would have gotten 2 more sets--I've tried expensive wireless noise-cancelling headphones (too much static), ear buds (hurts my ears), other brands of headphones (didn't last long)--and I've got to say  The cord is long enough for my needs.  The earpieces swivel but were not too  "delicate" for my use.  I'm tickled to find these headphones!
